alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 25 at 2:51PM EDT until March 26 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New York, Southeastern St. Lawrence, Southern Franklin and Western Clinton Counties. In Vermont, Eastern Franklin, Eastern Chittenden, Eastern Addison and Eastern Rutland Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty southeast winds will develop by late this afternoon and peak between 6 PM and 11 PM this evening, before abating after midnight.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton
